sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.CLOCK as "clock", a.ITEMCODE as "itemcode", a.MONITORID as "monitorid", a.FACTORID as "factorid", a.computermode as "computermode",
a.itemname as "itemname", a.departmentid as "departmentid", a.procedureid as "procedureid", a.licenceid as "licenceid", a.pkid as "pkid", a.YOUZUZHI as "youzuzhi", a.EQUIVALENT as "equivalent",
c.ZL_RUNTIME as "runtime", c.ZL_AVGFEIQI as "avgfeiqi", c.ZL_TOTALFEIQI as "totalfeiqi", c.ZL_AVGNONGDU as "avgnongdu", c.ZL_FINALVALUE as "finalvalue", c.ZL_HIGHDATATIME as "highdatatime", c.ZL_HIGHNONGDU as "highnongdu", c.ZL_HASOVERLIMIT as "hasoverlimit", c.LIMIT as "limit", c.ZL_DA_OR_XIAO as "daorxiao",
d.USER_NAME as "computeman", c.ZL_COMPUTETIME as "computetime",
'$totaltype$' as "totaltype"
from ${hbSchema}.v_hd_taxandtotal_detail a left join ${hbSchema}.t_hd_taxandtotal_value c on(a.itemcode=c.itemcode and a.clock=c.clock and a.monitorid=c.monitorid and a.factorid=c.factorid) left join ${platSchema}.XS_USER d on c.ZL_COMPUTEMAN=d.LOGIN_NAME where a.istotal='1'
a.CLOCK = #clock#
a.ITEMCODE = #itemcode#
a.MONITORID = #monitorid#
a.FACTORID = #factorid#
a.departmentid = #departmentid#
a.procedureid = #procedureid#
a.computermode = #computermode#
a.youzuzhi = #youzuzhi#
a.equivalent = #equivalent#
$orderBy$
a.departmentid asc, a.procedureid asc, a.itemcode asc, a.FACTORID asc

SELECT a.CLOCK as "clock", a.ITEMCODE as "itemcode", a.MONITORID as "monitorid", a.FACTORID as "factorid", a.computermode as "computermode",
a.itemname as "itemname", a.departmentid as "departmentid", a.procedureid as "procedureid", a.licenceid as "licenceid", a.pkid as "pkid", a.YOUZUZHI as "youzuzhi", a.EQUIVALENT as "equivalent",
c.TAX_RUNTIME as "runtime", c.TAX_AVGFEIQI as "avgfeiqi", c.TAX_TOTALFEIQI as "totalfeiqi", c.TAX_AVGNONGDU as "avgnongdu", c.TAX_FINALVALUE as "finalvalue", c.TAX_HIGHDATATIME as "highdatatime", c.TAX_HIGHNONGDU as "highnongdu", c.TAX_HASOVERLIMIT as "hasoverlimit", c.EQUIVALENT as "equivalent", c.TOTALEQUIVALENT as "totalequivalent", c.TAX as "tax", c.TOTALTAX as "totaltax", c.REDUCTIONTAX as "reductiontax", c.realtax as "realtax", c.LIMIT as "limit", c.THISMONTHDATA as "thismonthdata", c.TAX_DA_OR_XIAO as "daorxiao",
d.USER_NAME as "computeman", c.TAX_COMPUTETIME as "computetime", c.NEEDTAXMARK as "needtaxmark", c.TAX_HIGHNONGDU_CHANGE as "taxHighnongduChange",
'$totaltype$' as "totaltype"
from ${hbSchema}.v_hd_taxandtotal_detail a left join ${hbSchema}.t_hd_taxandtotal_value c on(a.itemcode=c.itemcode and a.clock=c.clock and a.monitorid=c.monitorid and a.factorid=c.factorid) left join ${platSchema}.XS_USER d on c.TAX_COMPUTEMAN=d.LOGIN_NAME where a.istax='1'
a.CLOCK = #clock#
a.ITEMCODE = #itemcode#
a.MONITORID = #monitorid#
a.FACTORID = #factorid#
a.departmentid = #departmentid#
a.procedureid = #procedureid#
a.computermode = #computermode#
a.youzuzhi = #youzuzhi#
a.equivalent = #equivalent#
$orderBy$
a.departmentid asc, a.procedureid asc, a.itemcode asc, a.FACTORID asc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_VALUE WHERE 1=1
CLOCK = #clock#
ITEMCODE = #itemcode#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
FACTORID = #factorid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_VALUE (CLOCK, ITEMCODE, MONITORID, FACTORID, ZL_RUNTIME, ZL_AVGFEIQI, ZL_TOTALFEIQI, ZL_AVGNONGDU, ZL_FINALVALUE, ZL_HIGHDATATIME, ZL_HIGHNONGDU, ZL_HASOVERLIMIT, TAX_RUNTIME, TAX_AVGFEIQI, TAX_TOTALFEIQI, TAX_AVGNONGDU, TAX_FINALVALUE, TAX_HIGHDATATIME, TAX_HIGHNONGDU, TAX_HASOVERLIMIT, EQUIVALENT, TOTALEQUIVALENT, TAX, TOTALTAX, REDUCTIONTAX, LIMIT, THISMONTHDATA, ZL_COMPUTE_AVGNONGDU, ZL_DA_OR_XIAO, TAX_COMPUTE_AVGNONGDU, TAX_DA_OR_XIAO, ZL_COMPUTEMAN, ZL_COMPUTETIME, TAX_COMPUTEMAN, TAX_COMPUTETIME, NEEDTAXMARK, TAX_OLD_HIGHNONGDU, TAX_HIGHNONGDU_CHANGE ) VALUES (#clock:VARCHAR#, #itemcode:VARCHAR#, #monitorid:VARCHAR#, #factorid:VARCHAR#, #zlRuntime:VARCHAR#, #zlAvgfeiqi:VARCHAR#, #zlTotalfeiqi:VARCHAR#, #zlAvgnongdu:VARCHAR#, #zlFinalvalue:VARCHAR#, #zlHighdatatime:VARCHAR#, #zlHighnongdu:VARCHAR#, #zlHasoverlimit:VARCHAR#, #taxRuntime:VARCHAR#, #taxAvgfeiqi:VARCHAR#, #taxTotalfeiqi:VARCHAR#, #taxAvgnongdu:VARCHAR#, #taxFinalvalue:VARCHAR#, #taxHighdatatime:VARCHAR#, #taxHighnongdu:VARCHAR#, #taxHasoverlimit:VARCHAR#, #equivalent:VARCHAR#, #totalequivalent:VARCHAR#, #tax:VARCHAR#, #totaltax:VARCHAR#, #reductiontax:VARCHAR#, #limit:VARCHAR#, #thismonthdata:VARCHAR#, #zlComputeAvgnongdu:VARCHAR#, #zlDaOrXiao:VARCHAR#, #taxComputeAvgnongdu:VARCHAR#, #taxDaOrXiao:VARCHAR#, #zlComputeman:VARCHAR#, #zlComputetime:VARCHAR#, #taxComputeman:VARCHAR#, #taxComputetime:VARCHAR#, #needtaxmark:VARCHAR#, #taxOldHighnongdu:VARCHAR#, #taxHighnongduChange:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_VALUE WHERE CLOCK = #clock# AND ITEMCODE = #itemcode# AND MONITORID = #monitorid# AND FACTORID = #factorid#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_VALUE SET ZL_RUNTIME = #zlRuntime#, ZL_AVGFEIQI = #zlAvgfeiqi#, ZL_TOTALFEIQI = #zlTotalfeiqi#, ZL_AVGNONGDU = #zlAvgnongdu#, ZL_FINALVALUE = #zlFinalvalue#, ZL_HIGHDATATIME = #zlHighdatatime#, ZL_HIGHNONGDU = #zlHighnongdu#, ZL_HASOVERLIMIT = #zlHasoverlimit#, TAX_RUNTIME = #taxRuntime#, TAX_AVGFEIQI = #taxAvgfeiqi#, TAX_TOTALFEIQI = #taxTotalfeiqi#, TAX_AVGNONGDU = #taxAvgnongdu#, TAX_FINALVALUE = #taxFinalvalue#, TAX_HIGHDATATIME = #taxHighdatatime#, TAX_HIGHNONGDU = #taxHighnongdu#, TAX_HASOVERLIMIT = #taxHasoverlimit#, EQUIVALENT = #equivalent#, TOTALEQUIVALENT = #totalequivalent#, TAX = #tax#, TOTALTAX = #totaltax#, REDUCTIONTAX = #reductiontax#, LIMIT = #limit#, THISMONTHDATA = #thismonthdata#, ZL_COMPUTE_AVGNONGDU = #zlComputeAvgnongdu#, ZL_DA_OR_XIAO = #zlDaOrXiao#, TAX_COMPUTE_AVGNONGDU = #taxComputeAvgnongdu#, TAX_DA_OR_XIAO = #taxDaOrXiao#, ZL_COMPUTEMAN = #zlComputeman#, ZL_COMPUTETIME = #zlComputetime#, TAX_COMPUTEMAN = #taxComputeman#, TAX_COMPUTETIME = #taxComputetime#, NEEDTAXMARK = #needtaxmark#, TAX_OLD_HIGHNONGDU = #taxOldHighnongdu#, TAX_HIGHNONGDU_CHANGE = #taxHighnongduChange# WHERE CLOCK = #clock# AND ITEMCODE = #itemcode# AND MONITORID = #monitorid# AND FACTORID = #factorid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT datavalue as "datavalue", datatime as datatime FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hd_taxandtotal_datatimeinfo where 1=1
CLOCK = #clock#
ITEMCODE = #itemcode#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
FACTORID = #factorid#
totaltype = #totaltype#
category = #category#
site_factor_id = #site_factor_id#

SELECT datavalue as "datavalue", datatime as datatime FROM ${hbSchema}.t_hd_taxandtotal_datatimeinfo where 1=1
CLOCK = #clock#
ITEMCODE = #itemcode#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
FACTORID = #factorid#
totaltype = #totaltype#
category = #category#
site_factor_id = #site_factor_id#

SELECT t1.DATATIME AS "clock", t6.TARGET_NAME AS "departmentname", sum(CASE WHEN (t1.REALVAL = null or t1.REALVAL = '') THEN '0' else t1.REALVAL END) as "finalvalue" FROM ${hbSchema}.FINEREPORT_INFO t1 left join ${hbSchema}.FINEREPORT_ITEM t6 on t1.SERIES=t6.TARGET_ID WHERE t1.TYPE='tar0003' and t1.STATUS='1'
t1.DATATIME = #clock#
t6.TARGET_NAME = #targetName#
GROUP BY t1.DATATIME, t6.TARGET_NAME

SELECT t2.TARGET_NAME as "departmentname", t1.DATATIME as "clock", t1.REALVAL as "finalvalue" FROM ${hbSchema}.FINEREPORT_INFO t1 left join ${hbSchema}.FINEREPORT_ITEM t2 on t1.CLASSIFICATION=t2.TARGET_ID left join ( select t3.CLASSIFICATION,max(t3.DATATIME) DATATIME from ${hbSchema}.FINEREPORT_INFO t3 where t3.TYPE='tar0003' group by t3.CLASSIFICATION )t4 on t1.CLASSIFICATION=t4.CLASSIFICATION
left join ${hbSchema}.FINEREPORT_ITEM t5 on t1.SERIES=t5.TARGET_ID WHERE t1.DATATIME=t4.DATATIME AND t1.TYPE='tar0003'
t5.TARGET_NAME = #targetName#

SELECT t2.TARGET_NAME as "departmentname", SUM(CASE WHEN (t1.REALVAL = null or t1.REALVAL = '') THEN '0' else t1.REALVAL END) AS "finalvalue" FROM ${hbSchema}.FINEREPORT_INFO t1 LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.FINEREPORT_ITEM t2 ON t1.CLASSIFICATION = t2.TARGET_ID LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.FINEREPORT_ITEM t5 ON t1.SERIES = t5.TARGET_ID WHERE t1.TYPE = 'tar0003'
t1.DATATIME like '%$clock$%'
t5.TARGET_NAME = #targetName#
GROUP BY t2.TARGET_NAME
